snippet: Taking a page from the technology industry's playbook of how to nurture start-ups, the Alberleen Group was set up to help seasoned financiers run their own firms.
abstract: Taking a page from the technology industry's playbook of how to nurture start-ups, the Alberleen Group was set up to help seasoned financiers run their own firms.

headline.main: For Deal Makers, Incubator Offers an Alternative to Wall St.
